bibl.title: Images and Ideologies. Self-Definition in the Hellenistic World
bibl.note: Dans la part Two de l'ouvrage (Identity and Crisis in Hellenistic Literature, pp. 125-195), fait pendant à l'exposé de: Peter PARSONS, Identities in Diversity, pp. 152-170. - Voir pp. 171-195: Albert HENRICHS, Response.

Anthony BULLOCH, Erich S. GRUEN, A.A. LONG and Andrew STEWART (Edd.), Images and Ideologies. Self-Definition in the Hellenistic World = Hellenistic Culture and Society. 12 (Berkeley - Los Angeles - London, 1994) pp. 130-151.
